title: Day 264 (Zechariah 5-9) - Year 2

description:
SHOW NOTES:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- The Bible Recap Printable Reading Plan 

- The Bible Recap New Testament Reading Plan (on the Bible app)

- Galatians 3:13

- Revelation 14:8

- Isaiah 6:1

- Matthew 21:1-11

- Help others find The Bible Recap! 

 

SOCIALS:

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
